# SERVIN INGENIERÍA S.A. - Corporate Website

## Project Overview
Premium corporate website for SERVIN INGENIERÍA S.A. built with React + Vite + TailwindCSS.

## Design Guidelines
- Corporate colors: Red (#E00000), Graphite Gray (#2e2c3a), White (#fefefe)
- Modern, clean, professional engineering aesthetic
- Well-defined blocks, ample white space
- Corporate iconography and heavy industry imagery

## Architecture
- React functional components with hooks
- Modular component structure
- TailwindCSS for styling
- React Router for navigation
- SEO optimized
- AA accessibility compliance
- Fully responsive design

## Pages Structure
1. Home - Corporate landing
2. About Us - Company information
3. Services - Engineering divisions
4. Contact - Professional contact form

## Development Standards
- Component-based architecture
- Corporate brand consistency
- Performance optimization
- Clean code practices
- Professional UX/UI patterns

Project Status: In Development
